title: 做緊IT 既你, 黎緊會移去邊?

replies.msg:
係香港做IT 普遍都不受尊重
以目前既大環境黎睇, 香港黎緊前景亦都唔見得會好得去邊
依加有幾個options 俾你會點揀?

UK:
BNO 5+1 零門檻咁滯
做 Financial related 既tech 容易D搵工 (紐倫港, 不過就快變紐倫坡)
Brexit 之後既前景好多不確定性
排外方面比其他地方嚴重少少, 治安同樣
發展度較高, 生活應該同香港較接近

Canada:
整體生活質素較高
移民國家, 包容性高
tech 既工作機會好似相對較少 (個個都 aim USA)
天氣可能難適應
grad左5年內, 有3年working visa, 1年就可以申請PR (不過details 未定)
地大

(USA 未有pathway, 依加apply 同中國/印度人一齊爭, 澳洲Tech field 唔太熟)

UK
Canada
其他destination 都歡迎留低你既諗法

replies.msg:
Not essentially, it's kind of like hosting some AWS services on your own infrastructure so the services are dedicated to you. Some examples are Red Hat OpenStack and Oracle PCA. Even AWS published a new service last year called AWS Outposts that allows you to run AWS services on-premise, though the supported services are quite limited.

Basically, most AWS services have some alternative solution that you can host yourself. Think EC2, which is the AWS version of on-premise VMware ESXi; or S3, kind of like a NAS.
